sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通過專項整治，再現京城水系和古典園林的歷史風貌。

sentences.english: Second, update the landscape character on Kuling town .
sentences.chinese: 其次，更新牯嶺鎮景觀風貌。

sentences.english: Protecting and displaying the historical and cultural heritage of the city ?
sentences.chinese: 保護和展示歷史文化名城的風貌。

sentences.english: Changning shows pastoral scenery and human landscape.
sentences.chinese: 展示了昌寧的山水田園風光及人文風貌。

sentences.english: Different ways of reciting bring about variant appearances of poems.
sentences.chinese: 不同的吟唱方式便使詩作產生不同的風貌。

sentences.english: This is still characterized the spirit of this county, also has tourist value.
sentences.chinese: 此仍足以表徵本縣的精神風貌，亦十分具有觀光價值。

sentences.english: The ancient battlefield has become something holy. It was almost untouched.
sentences.chinese: 古戰場成了聖地，它幾乎保持着當年的風貌。

sentences.english: Wuzhen Water Village style integrity, and maintain a complete pattern of Yangtze River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 烏鎮水鄉風貌完整，保持了完整的江南水鄉格局。

sentences.english: In fact, it had unique feathers and importance of the history of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 其實，它是有其獨特風貌及詩史意義的。

sentences.english: As a result, the ethos of the information technology industry changed.
sentences.chinese: 這一切改變了信息技術產業的精神風貌。

sentences.english: A vast amount of stone buildings gestate the characteristic style and features of residential building in Huian coastal areas.
sentences.chinese: 大量的石構建築形成了惠安沿海居民住宅的特殊風貌。

sentences.english: ZhuZhi Fang District is one of the few traditional districts with long history in the city of FuZhou.
sentences.chinese: 朱紫坊是福州市僅存不多的歷史傳統風貌街區之一。

sentences.english: The sea, in addition to describe the geographic positions, also recorded the styles of countries and people which are far away .
sentences.chinese: 《海經》除著錄地理方位外，還記載遠國異人的風貌。

sentences.english: These narrow alleyways will give you a glimpse of what Beijing used to be like.
sentences.chinese: 這些狹窄的小巷能夠讓你一覽北京舊時風貌。

sentences.english: Well, after a brief look at this ancient city.
sentences.chinese: 好了，看過了惠遠古城的風貌之後呢。

sentences.english: Only those poems that reflect the scenes of an age and express the wishes of the masses can be called epics.
sentences.chinese: 反映時代風貌，表達人民心聲的詩歌才能稱爲詩史。

definition: to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
